A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
'This is not going go the way you think' is absolutely correct.

I came out of the movie absolutely dejected. I didn't get the movie I expected. I didn't get answers I thought were coming. I even thought that TLJ was the worst Star Wars movie since the Phantom Menace.

But\, ive had a few days to think about it and to be honest\, I've thought about little else.  I didn't get what I expected and that is a GOOD THING! This film could have easily been an Empire Strikes Back clone but they took a brave and different route which on reflection I really love! 

Ok\, it was too long. A couple of scenes didn't stand up very well but on the whole TLJ gave star wars a much needed kick up the ass! I can't wait for Blu Ray!
